text.content: JAPP, - You must think me a forgetful rogue, as indeed I am; for I have but now told my publisher to send you a copy of the FAMILIAR STUDIES.
However, I own I have delayed this letter till I could send you the enclosed.
Remembering the nights at Braemar when we visited the Picture Gallery, I hoped they might amuse you.
You see, we do some publishing hereaway.
I shall hope to see you in town in May.

- Always yours faithfully,
ROBERT LOUIS STEVENSON.
